summary: The diff implements security fixes and UI improvements without any explicitly documented requirements in the BuildRequest. The changes include a security fix preventing users from creating multiple buildings, enhanced invite code management UI, a new Building Members page showing member statistics, improved Home page dashboard with real-time statistics, and URL parameter utility functions for onboarding flow management.

hallucinated_features.description: Security fix preventing users from creating multiple buildings (checking for existing binaId before allowing binaOlustur)
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement specified this security enhancement in the BuildRequest

hallucinated_features.description: Security enforcement of immutable binaId and role fields in saveCallerUserProfile to prevent privilege escalation
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement specified this security hardening feature in the BuildRequest

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced InviteCodePanel UI with role-based filtering, descriptive cards, improved code display with status badges and timestamps
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement specified these UI enhancements in the BuildRequest

hallucinated_features.description: New BuildingMembers page displaying member statistics calculated from invite codes including role distribution and member list
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement specified creating this new page in the BuildRequest

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced Home page dashboard with real-time statistics from invite codes, stats cards showing active members and invite code usage, and quick actions section
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement specified these dashboard improvements in the BuildRequest

hallucinated_features.description: URL parameter utility functions for onboarding flow management (storeOnboardingFlow, getOnboardingFlow, clearOnboardingFlow)
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement specified adding these utility functions in the BuildRequest
